Title: Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Next Generation
Writer: Kim Henkel (characters), Tobe Hooper (characters), Kim Henkel
Actors: Renée Zellweger, Matthew McConaughey, Robert Jacks, Tonie Perensky
Plot: This is the twisted tale of Vilmer and his crazy family which includes the lovely Leatherface. They have pastime of killing and stuffing people. Unfortunately, Jenny and her friends run into Vilmer and his clan in the middle of the night in the middle of the woods.
Production: Genre Pictures, Ultra Muchos Productions, Return Productions
